publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3904 Brian Adam: Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009—That the Parliament notes the death of Professor Sir Neil MacCormick, MEP for Scotland from 1999 to 2004 and Regius Professor of Public Law and the Law of Nature and Nations at Edinburgh University from 1972 to 2008, and pays tribute to the significant contribution that he made to promoting Scotland’s interests in Europe and to his international standing as one of the world’s leading legal scholars.
S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Mike Pringle*

S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, David McLetchie*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*, Liam McArthur*, Ian McKee*, Bob Doris*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Jim Hume*, Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*, Christine Grahame*, Robert Brown*, Stewart Maxwell*, Anne McLaughlin*, Hugh Henry*, Ken Macintosh*

S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Willie Coffey*, Ross Finnie*, Bill Wilson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Andrew Welsh*, Patrick Harvie*, Cathy Jamieson*, Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*, John Wilson*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Jack McConnell*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Alison McInnes*
S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-3904 Neil MacCormick, 1941 to 2009 (lodged on 14 April 2009) Dave Thompson*
